DOC.detailed_description: The primary aim study demonstrate safety efficacy use photopneumatic system treatment mild moderate acne face body - include neck , chest , back - 24 subject . To support clinical assessment , affect area treat documented baseline , subsequent treatment visit ( 6 treatment ) , one ( 1 ) month three ( 3 ) month follow final treatment .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Fitzpatrick skin type IVI . 2 . Male female . 3 . Subjects must 18 55 year age . 4 . Subjects must mild moderate acne ( define 15 inflammatory noninflammatory lesion ) . 5 . Subjects must read , understand , sign inform consent form . 6 . Subjects must willing able comply followup requirement . 1 . Subjects must active localized systemic infection . 2 . Subjects must compromise ability wound healing , : malnutrition , steroid use , history collagen vascular disease ( e.g . lupus , scleroderma , history keloid scar formation ) , atrophic dermatitis immunologic abnormality vitiligo . 3 . Subjects must receive microdermabrasion within one ( 1 ) month prior enrollment . 4 . Subjects must receive immunosuppressive medication ( ) one ( 1 ) month prior enrollment . 5 . Subjects must receive laser light treatment within last three ( 3 ) month . 6 . Subjects must receive dermabrasion , TCA peel great 20 % , botulinum toxin type A , dermal filler , photodynamic therapy ( PDT ) , cosmetic surgery within last six ( 6 ) month . 7 . Subjects must currently take use isotretinoin ( e.g . Accutane ) within six ( 6 ) month prior enrollment . 8 . Subjects must agree refrain use cosmeceutical agent topical agent course study , except direct study investigator . 9 . Subjects must previous ablative laser treatment . 10 . Subjects must refrain excessive sun exposure participation study . 11 . Subjects must condition result photosensitivity take medication contain aminolevulinic acid ( E.g . Levulan ) . 12 . Subjects must current past smoker cigarettes and/or cigar . 13 . Subjects must pregnant . 14 . Any condition situation would prevent subject safely complete protocol requirement participation .
